predisposition-type-vocab
=========================

**Social and Mental Health Issues** (1)

    A history of behaviors related to the insider's mental health or unacceptable social behavior

**A History of Rule Violations** (2)

    A history of violating the law or violating rules at other organizations

**Suspicious Associations** (3)

    A history of associating with criminal or otherwise objectionable persons or entities

**Personal Stressful Events** (4)

    Events in the insider's personal life that could lead to additional stress or further motivate the insider to harm their organization
